body.raw:
{
    "title": "The Future of Artificial Intelligence in 2024",
    "content": "Artificial Intelligence has been rapidly evolving, and 2024 promises to be a groundbreaking year for AI technology. From advanced machine learning models to practical applications in everyday life, AI is reshaping how we work, communicate, and solve complex problems. This comprehensive guide explores the latest trends, innovations, and what to expect in the AI landscape this year.",
    "category_id": 10,
    "image_url": "https://example.com/images/ai-future.jpg",
    "keywords": "artificial intelligence, AI, machine learning, technology, 2024, innovation, automation",
    "status": "published"
  }

{
    "title": "Travel Guide: Hidden Gems in Southeast Asia",
    "content": "Southeast Asia is full of incredible destinations that many travelers overlook. From secluded beaches in Philippines to ancient temples in Cambodia, this region offers unforgettable experiences for adventurous souls. Join us as we explore some of the most beautiful and lesser-known places that should be on every traveler's bucket list.",
    "category_id": 10,
    "image_url": "https://example.com/images/southeast-asia.jpg",
    "keywords": "travel, southeast asia, hidden gems, adventure, temples, beaches, backpacking",
    "status": "draft"
  }

{
    "title": "The Revolutionary Impact of AI in 2024: A Deep Dive",
    "content": "Artificial Intelligence continues to revolutionize industries and reshape our daily lives. In 2024, we're witnessing unprecedented advancements in AI technology, from generative AI models to autonomous systems. This updated analysis explores the latest developments, practical applications, and future implications of AI technology across various sectors including healthcare, finance, education, and entertainment.",
    "category_id": 10,
    "image_url": "https://example.com/images/ai-revolution-2024.jpg",
    "keywords": "artificial intelligence, AI revolution, 2024 trends, machine learning, automation, generative AI, technology impact",
    "status": "published"
  }
